1.title: How AI can transform your SME in 2025
1.excerpt: Discover the concrete applications of artificial intelligence that are within reach of small and medium-sized enterprises today.
1.content:
## AI: More Than a Buzzword for SMEs in 2025

In 2025, Artificial Intelligence is no longer reserved for Tech giants. For SMEs, it represents an unprecedented lever for competitiveness. But where to start?

### 1. Automation of Administrative Tasks
AI can now handle invoice entry, document filing, and even responding to redundant emails. Estimated time saved: **up to 15 hours per week** for your administrative teams.

### 2. Customer Relationship Personalization
Thanks to LLMs (Large Language Models), you can offer 24/7 customer support that truly understands your interlocutors' needs, with the same finesse as a human agent.

### 3. Simple Predictive Analytics
Predicting your stock needs or activity peaks has never been so accessible. Modern AI tools analyze your historical data to prevent stockouts or overstocking.

**Conclusion:** The challenge of 2025 is not knowing if you will use AI, but to what extent it will be integrated into the heart of your business processes.

2.title: The 5 cybersecurity threats not to ignore
2.excerpt: Security is not an option. Overview of major risks and strategies to effectively protect yourself against them.
2.content:
## Cybersecurity: The Risk Panorama in 2026

With the growing sophistication of attacks, the question is no longer "if" you will be attacked, but "when". Here are the 5 critical threats to watch.

### 1. Phishing by Deepfake
Attackers now use AI to clone the voice or image of your executives. Be vigilant about urgent transfer requests, even if they seem to come from the CEO.

### 2. Supply Chain Attacks
Your SME may be a gateway to a larger client. Hackers target weak links. Secure your supplier access.

**Advice:** Adopt the "Zero Trust" principle. Trust no entity by default, even inside your network.

3.title: The ROI of digital transformation: myth or reality?
3.excerpt: Going beyond the buzzword. How to concretely measure the financial impact of your technical investments.
3.content:
## Measuring Digital Return on Investment

Investing in tech is expensive. Knowing how much it brings in is crucial.

### 1. Reduction of Operational Costs
Automation reduces human errors and time spent on low-value tasks. Calculate the hourly rate saved x number of hours.

### 2. Revenue Increase
New digital sales channels or better conversion thanks to UX can directly boost your revenue.

**The trap to avoid:** Don't just look at immediate financial ROI. Take into account employee satisfaction and customer retention.
